page.title: 10Education/Head's Day.
page.content: 08.30 Arrive at school and check diary for the day-list priorities.Available to see teachers.09.05 school day starts.09.15 Assembly-two mornings a week.09.30 Lessons begin.I deal with the mail and any outstanding admin' work.I am always available to see staff,parents and visitors and feel this to be important.I like to walk round the school to see classes at work,visit the kitchen/caretaker to show interest and give support.I also teach-at least 25%.12.05-13.15 lunch.This provides another occasion to talk to staff and pupils.13.15 Afternoon lessons begin.I aim to tackle longer-term management,work on curriculum,school organisation,staff interviews etc.15.45 School ends for pupils,but not for staff.I usually leave school by 17.00 and take work home to prepare for following day.
